channel.title: NullPointer spam when logging in
channel.description: I am sorry, I have looked everywhere and have yet to find a solution to my problem. I am hoping you all can point me in the right direction. This is the error that appears: [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\*****.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The syste m cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115) at client.startUp(client.java:9163) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException sendPacket185(2458) java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException [/code] I don't care about the map config as much as the nullpointer spamming. I quickly logged out, which is what sendpacket185(2458) is, the log out button. When I log in, the Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 shows up, and then the spamming begins. doesn't mess up anything, but it's ugly. Thanks in advance

item.title: NullPointer spam when logging in
item.dc:creator: @thedolphin thedolphin
item.description:
@thedolphin wrote:

Crown2:

well you would have to probably rewrite some code its not doing anything just messy mabey slowing down server but it just “looks bad” ur gonna have to live with it

I have no problem rewriting lol, I am really dedicated to this, I’ve just been running into a lot of problems, and this seemed like one of those little things.

Read full topic

item.title: NullPointer spam when logging in
item.dc:creator: @thedolphin thedolphin
item.description:
@thedolphin wrote:

[quote=“Crown2, post:2, topic:433814”]A java.lang.NullPointerException occurs when a Java application or Java applet has been badly coded. Typically, the Java program (and consequently, the programmer) attempted to access the reference or handle to a Java object that did not exist.[/quote]Ah, thank you very much! I had nothing to do with this error, thankfully, but do you know any way of fixing this? Or should I just get a new source?

Read full topic

item.title: NullPointer spam when logging in
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

A java.lang.NullPointerException occurs when a Java application or Java applet has been badly coded. Typically, the Java program (and consequently, the programmer) attempted to access the reference or handle to a Java object that did not exist.

Read full topic

item.title: NullPointer spam when logging in
item.dc:creator: @thedolphin thedolphin
item.description:
@thedolphin wrote:

I am sorry, I have looked everywhere and have yet to find a solution to my problem. I am hoping you all can point me in the right direction. This is the error that appears:

java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\*****.cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The syste m cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:115) at client.startUp(client.java:9163) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6165) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException sendPacket185(2458) java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException java.lang.NullPointerException
I don’t care about the map config as much as the nullpointer spamming. I quickly logged out, which is what sendpacket185(2458) is, the log out button. When I log in, the Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 shows up, and then the spamming begins. doesn’t mess up anything, but it’s ugly. Thanks in advance
